communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Untitled
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing this letter to request the oath for the Office of Christine Fox Gross Polowy Law firm, AMBER JUREK Gross Polowy Law firm, NICOLE GAZZO Gross Polowy Law firm, CHRISTOPHER PAVLIK, ANTHONY SCALI hinshaw law, ALEXANDRA HEANEY Gross Polowy Law firm, Ben Raindorf  hin shawlaw, MARY ILARDO Gross Polowy Law firm, FRANK LOMBARDI pmt law firm. , AMANIE AKARAH, CHARLES MILLER hinshaw law, accompanied by a detailed list of all bonds, sureties, indemnification, and insurance, Court Registry Investment System (CRIS), and CUSIP numbers. Through the unwarranted presentation of the arrogated paperwork intrusion upon the JOSEPH CORNELIUS NICHOLAS Estate ..  
I hope you can help us in this matter.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joseph Cornelius Nicholas
